message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
Alice, your product sounds interesting, but $12000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to offer $8500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $8500 is a bit lower than my initial asking price, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10500. This is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.
Alice,  $10500 is still a little high for me. I'm willing to go up to $9500. If you're serious about selling, this is my final offer.

I understand that $9500 is still a bit lower than my target price, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10200. This is my final counteroffer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
